name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience proficient in **Java**, **C++**, and **C#**, possessing strong capabilities in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **OCI** cloud services. Excel in building robust distributed systems and implementing **REST**ful architectures within an **Agile** development environment. Proven expertise in **CI/CD** practices, ensuring seamless software delivery and higher observability in production systems. Skilled in **security** best practices and delivering exceptional user experiences through object-oriented design.
Also proficient in **AI/ML** technologies, having developed solutions leveraging predictive analytics, real-time processing, and automation. Extensive experience with modern tech stacks including **JavaScript**/**TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in frontend and backend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. A strong advocate for compliance-driven development with a solid understanding of regulations like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Demonstrated knowledge in MLOps practices utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

Led Agile development processes, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions within **2-week** sprint cycles.
Emphasized observability and security in all systems, implementing advanced monitoring tools and practices to ensure system integrity and responsiveness.
Conducted in-depth code reviews and mentoring for junior developers, promoting object-oriented design principles and coding best practices.
Designed user interfaces with an emphasis on enhancing user experience and accessibility, working closely with UI/UX designers.
Analyzed project requirements and collaborated with stakeholders to ensure alignment with business objectives and technology strategies.

Utilized **Java** and **C#** to enhance the architecture of core financial platforms, improving scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Developed and maintained **Azure**-based microservices using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and Python (FastAPI, Django) with a focus on effective **Distributed Systems** implementation.
Created seamless user experiences with interactive front-end applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, leveraging Redux Toolkit for state management and **Tailwind CSS** for responsive designs.
Implemented **Agile** methodologies in project management, ensuring quick delivery cycles and efficient team collaboration.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with insights into over **1 million** transactions monthly.
Designed robust event-driven architectures procuring asynchronous communication using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** for critical workflows such as payments and compliance.
Constructed **ETL** pipelines for ingesting financial data using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, optimizing support for both batch and real-time processing needs.
Developed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, allowing proactive detection of potentially fraudulent activities.
Created machine learning pipelines for real-time credit scoring and churn prediction, incorporating **MLflow** and **Airflow** for streamlined model inference integration.
Applied **Observability** techniques to monitor application metrics and ensure **Security** best practices across all developed services.

Utilized **Java** and **C#** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment with response times under **200ms**.
Engineered real-time features leveraging **AWS** services and **Kafka**, enabling order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and responsive customer support, achieving an uptime of **99.9%**.
Developed robust frontend applications with **React (18)** and **Angular**, applying **TypeScript** for code maintainability and performance, successfully enhancing user engagement by **30%**.
Implemented **REST**ful APIs and utilized **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL** for distributed data storage, achieving efficient data retrieval times under **50ms** and supports for high-traffic workflows.
Integrated machine learning capabilities within the platform using **TensorFlow** and **LightGBM**, facilitating AI-driven recommendations that improved conversion rates by **25%** based on user behavior data.
Executed **CI/CD** pipelines and utilized **Agile** methodologies, allowing for rapid iteration on features and deploying updates within **hours** rather than days.
Developed user-friendly interfaces compliant with **WCAG 2.1** accessibility guidelines, using **HTML5/CSS3**, ensuring mobile-first responsiveness optimized for a seamless user experience.
Designed secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe** and **PayPal**, applying industry-leading security practices including PCI compliance for protecting sensitive customer data.
Employed **security** best practices like **OAuth 2.0** and **RBAC** to ensure that user data protection measures are in place, maintaining adherence to GDPR requirements.
